name: latu
sizes_available: xs(s, m, l) fits to 6 months old(1-2 yrs old, 3-6 yrs old, adult)/head circumference: ~18(~20, ~21, ~23)”/~46(~50, ~54, ~58)cm
notes:
slouchy beanie pattern, sized from baby to adult with a little cable detail. pattern includes charts and written pattern.

ohje myös suomeksi!

danish translation available [here][1].



materials: 
yarn: 
lamana cusco (100% alpaca), 2 skeins; 50g/93yds/85m per skein. 
or
any other dk-weight yarn to achieve the correct gauge.
needles: 
us 8 (5 mm) 16”/40 cm circular needle. 
us 6 (4 mm) 16”/40 cm circular needle. 
adjust the needle size to get the correct gauge. 
other: 
cable needle, tapestry needle, stitch marker.
